Text Mining and Content Analysis with R

Text Mining and Content Analysis with R

This list contains links to third party tutorial collections:

  • Inhaltsanalyse mit R by Cornelius Puschmann
  • Text mining in R for the social sciences and digital humanities by Andreas Niekler and Gregor Wiedemann
  • Language Technology and Data Analysis Laboratory (LADAL) by Martin Schweinberger (University of Queensland)
  • Text Mining with R (Tidy Text Mining) by Julia Silge and David Robinson
